thread.title: Susan
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Susan

author: Susan
title: Susan
text: I ordered online, looking for a shower filter (to remove chlorine). Pelican Water Systems offers an excellent and affordable product. I had a reason to call customer service, and they were efficient, friendly and resolved my issue immediately and to my satisfaction. I can highly recommend this company and their product.
